explains: n. 一段经历，一段时期；（电视剧或广播剧的）集，一集；疾病的发作，发病；插句，插段；（希腊悲剧中）两段合唱之间的部分

sentences.en: The final episode will be shown next Sunday.
sentences.cn: 最后一集将于下周日播放。

sentences.en: It makes you want to watch the next episode to find out what's going to happen.
sentences.cn: 这使你想看下一集，以弄清接下来要发生什么。

sentences.en: I'd like to try and forget the whole episode.
sentences.cn: 我倒想尽量把那段经历全部忘掉。
